channel.title: My 508 server - Ohb. (NEED<HELP<)
channel.description:
Haya there:p
Since today i wanna get my own 508 server
What i got
Client + 508 cache. A Source (Rs2-devolution 508)
What i've done :
Opened up port 43594. Opened up port 43594 (in firewall)
How can i host it? how can other people play on my server?

item.title: My 508 server - Ohb. (NEED<HELP<)
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:2, topic:241230”]Well, first off make sure yopu have correctly port forwarded.
Next, run the server first. It is very critical you run the server 1st.
Next just open your client!

If you have a normal client, it will load automatically. If you have an IP changer client, you must put in your enabled DUC ip.[/quote]

For everyone else to connect you will want the No-Ip.

If you are connecting from the computer you are hosting off of… then use localhost.

Read full topic

item.title: My 508 server - Ohb. (NEED<HELP<)
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Well, first off make sure yopu have correctly port forwarded.
Next, run the server first. It is very critical you run the server 1st.
Next just open your client!

If you have a normal client, it will load automatically. If you have an IP changer client, you must put in your enabled DUC ip.

Read full topic
